= = = filming = = =
filming of [MASK] [MASK] took place in and around los angeles .
the production team attempted to find locations " that people haven 't already seen a hundred times in movies and on tv " , aiming for the film to appear as if it could be taking place anywhere in america " where people are trying to pursue the american dream but getting stopped by a horrible boss . "
" [MASK] " was represented by an office building in [MASK] , california , with the crew building the set on a vacant floor .
for " [MASK] chemical " , the production team found a " perfect landscape of pipes and containers " in santa fe springs , surrounding an unoccupied water cleaning and storage facility .
to take advantage of the surrounding imagery , the warehouse required an extensive series of [MASK] , including cutting windows into concrete walls and creating new [MASK] to allow for visuals of the warehouse exterior and provide a setting for the final scene of sutherland 's character .
a [MASK] friday 's in woodland hills , los angeles , was used as a bar frequented by nick , dale , and kurt , while the bar scene where they meet with jones was staged in downtown los angeles .
the film was shot digitally using the [MASK] genesis camera .
gordon encouraged the actors to improvise , though aniston claimed to not have taken advantage of the offer as much as her co - stars , stating , " my dialogue was just so beautifully choreographed that there wasn ’ t much that i needed to do ” .
gordon encouraged the actors to improvise , though aniston claimed to not have taken advantage of the offer as much as him co - stars , stating , " my dialogue was just so beautifully choreographed that there wasn ’ t much that i needed to do ” .
gordon encouraged the actors to improvise , though aniston claimed to not have taken advantage of the offer as much as his co - stars , stating , " my dialogue was just so beautifully choreographed that there wasn ’ t much that i needed to do ” .
= = = music = = =
the soundtrack was composed by award - winning composer christopher [MASK] , with music contributed by mike [MASK] of pearl jam , stefan [MASK] of dave matthews band and money mark — a collaborator with the [MASK] boys .
[MASK] , [MASK] , and mark worked with musicians matt chamberlain , david [MASK] , aaron kaplan , victor [MASK] , chris [MASK] , [MASK] [MASK] and dj [MASK] to develop the music .
major contributions were provided by mark on keyboard , [MASK] and [MASK] on guitar , [MASK] and [MASK] on bass , [MASK] on drums and dj [MASK] on [MASK] .
[MASK] recorded the soundtrack at the village recording studio in west los angeles and capitol records .
[MASK] attempted to remain " authentic " to the characters ' progression from average worker to calculated killer .
to achieve this aim , he decided against recording digitally , instead recording the tracks on two - inch analog tape , intending each musical cue to sound as if it was emanating from a vinyl record .
to achieve this aim , she decided against recording digitally , instead recording the tracks on two - inch analog tape , intending each musical cue to sound as if it was emanating from a vinyl record .
he explained , " the idea was to put together a band that would record the score together the same way that they would make an album .
she explained , " the idea was to put together a band that would record the score together the same way that they would make an album .
it isn 't over - produced or [MASK] and digital in any way .
it 's [MASK] , noisy , and full of [MASK] and [MASK] .
i knew that if we could [MASK] some of this sonic magic in the score , then the [MASK] and confidence of the music would play against bateman , sudeikis , and charlie day to really emphasize and elevate the humor in the situations that [MASK] . "
[MASK] continued , " we tracked through tape before pro tools to get that fat sound , and made every choice based on feel rather than perfection .
we even used the same [MASK] that money mark played on beck 's classic ‘ where it 's at ’ .
at the end of the day , seth [ gordon ] and i wanted to produce a score that is as [MASK] and full of attitude as the movie itself .
i think we did it ... and most of all , everyone had a blast in the process . "
[MASK] [MASK] : the original motion picture soundtrack was released in physical and digital formats on july 5 , 2011 , by [MASK] music .
the soundtrack consists of 33 tracks with a [MASK] of 63 minutes .
= = release = =
the world premiere of [MASK] [MASK] took place on june 30 , 2011 at [MASK] 's chinese theatre in hollywood , california .
= = = box office = = =
[MASK] [MASK] grossed $ 117 .
 5 million ( 56 .
 1 % ) in the north america and $ 92 .
 2 million ( 43 .
 9 % ) in other territories for a worldwide gross of $ [MASK] .
 6 million , against its budget of $ 35 million .
north america
[MASK] [MASK] was released on july 8 , 2011 in the united states and canada across 3 , [MASK] theaters .
it grossed $ [MASK] on the first day , giving it the second largest opening gross for an original r - rated comedy of the summer , behind bad [MASK] ( $ [MASK] ) .
for the opening weekend , the film took in a total of $ 28 , 302 , 165 , an average of $ 9 , 310 per theater , making it the number two film for the weekend , behind [MASK] : dark of the moon ( $ [MASK] ) , the second highest - grossing opening weekend for an original r - rated comedy , again behind bad [MASK] ( $ [MASK] ) , and the highest - grossing opening weekend ever for a dark / black comedy film , [MASK] the 2004 the [MASK] wives ( $ [MASK] ) .
the opening weekend audience was 51 % male , and 64 % of the audience were over 25 years of age .
the second weekend ( 15 – 17 july ) saw a further 94 theaters added , for a total of 3 , 134 .
box office revenue dropped by a " respectable " 38 % , taking $ [MASK] for a total gross of $ [MASK] in ten days .
the film ranked third for the weekend .
it remained in the top five films during its third week , dropping 33 % and leaving thirty theaters from the previous weekend , to take in $ [MASK] for a gross of $ [MASK] in 17 days .
on july 28 , 2011 , with $ [MASK] after 20 days , [MASK] [MASK] surpassed the war of the roses ( $ [MASK] ) to become the highest grossing dark / black comedy film in [MASK] dollars .
other territories
[MASK] [MASK] was released on july 7 , 2011 , in the united arab emirates ( $ 258 , 108 ) , and on july 8 in [MASK] ( $ 24 , [MASK] ) , latvia ( $ 15 , 750 ) , lebanon ( $ 36 , 316 ) and lithuania ( $ 13 , 676 ) , grossing $ 348 , 321 for the opening weekend and [MASK] a total of $ [MASK] , [MASK] in the first 17 days .
on the weekend of july 21 – 24 , the film opened in the united kingdom ( $ 3 , 386 , [MASK] ) , greece ( $ 367 , [MASK] ) , israel ( $ 200 , 372 ) , south africa ( $ 193 , [MASK] ) , norway ( $ 109 , 252 ) and east africa ( $ 7 , [MASK] ) .
= = = critical reception = = =
[MASK] [MASK] received generally positive reviews from critics .
on rotten tomatoes , the film holds a rating of 68 % , based on 208 reviews , with an average rating of 6 .
 2 / 10 .
the site 's critical consensus reads , " it 's nasty , uneven , and far from original , but thanks to a [MASK] assembled cast that makes the most of a solid premise , [MASK] [MASK] works . "
review aggregate metacritic gave the film a score of 57 out of 100 , based on 40 critics , indicating " mixed or average reviews " .
roger [MASK] gave the film three and a half stars out of four , calling it " well - cast " and commending it for playing to each actor 's strengths .
[MASK] gave particular praise to spacey , labeling him " superb " , and aniston , [MASK] her performance to be a " surprise " and a return to form , stating " she has acute comic timing and [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] sexual [MASK] " .
[MASK] gave particular praise to spacey , labeling him " superb " , and aniston , [MASK] her performance to be a " surprise " and a return to form , stating " he has acute comic timing and [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] sexual [MASK] " .
[MASK] gave particular praise to spacey , labeling her " superb " , and aniston , [MASK] her performance to be a " surprise " and a return to form , stating " she has acute comic timing and [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] sexual [MASK] " .
[MASK] gave particular praise to spacey , labeling him " superb " , and aniston , [MASK] him performance to be a " surprise " and a return to form , stating " she has acute comic timing and [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] sexual [MASK] " .
[MASK] gave particular praise to spacey , labeling him " superb " , and aniston , [MASK] his performance to be a " surprise " and a return to form , stating " she has acute comic timing and [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] sexual [MASK] " .
[MASK] called [MASK] [MASK] " cheerful and wicked " .
lisa [MASK] of entertainment weekly reacted positively , calling the film " a [MASK] , well - built , [MASK] nasty tale of resentment , [MASK] , and [MASK] revenge " and complimented the casting of the protagonists and antagonists .
the a.v.
club 's nathan [MASK] also praised the cast , stating that the picture " succeeds almost entirely on the chemistry of its three leads , who remain likeable even while [MASK] to [MASK] " , adding the " acting more than [MASK] for the film 's other failings . "
[MASK] singled out day 's performance as " a potent illustration of how a brilliant character actor with a spark of madness can elevate a [MASK] [MASK] farce into a solid mainstream comedy through sheer force of [MASK] . "
edward douglas of [MASK] credited director seth gordon with having assembled " the perfect cast " , claiming " the six leads kill in every scene " , but echoed nathan [MASK] 's sentiments that day is the " real standout " .
douglas summarized the picture as " dark fun that works better than expected due to a well - developed script , an [MASK] cast and a director who knows how to put the two together " .
a. o. scott of the new york times stated " the timing of the cast ... is [MASK] " and appreciated that the script did not attempt " to cut its [MASK] with a [MASK] dose of [MASK] or respectability " .
the review concluded that " in the ways that count and even when it shouldn ’ t , [MASK] [MASK] works . "
usa today 's scott [MASK] awarded the film three out of four stars , labeling it a " surprising comedy that rivals [MASK] as the funniest film of the summer , if not the year . "
[MASK] added that " the characters are so likable " , giving particular credit to sudeikis though also adding praise for the performances of bateman and day .
the dialogue was also lauded by [MASK] , which commented that " seth gordon has a [MASK] touch with water - cooler talk — even when the water cooler might be spiked with poison . "
leonard [MASK] of [MASK] considered day to have had the " breakout role " and offered praise to the performances of the cast , but lamented the lack of screen time for farrell 's character .
[MASK] concluded " the movie has just enough [MASK] to identify it as a 2011 comedy , just enough [MASK] to admire , and just the right [MASK] among its three male stars , which turns out to be the movie ’ s greatest strength . "
rolling stone 's peter travers gave [MASK] to the " killer cast " , with specific credit given to bateman and day , but was critical of the movie , stating " it [MASK] out on a sharp premise " and that it is a " hit - and - miss farce that leaves you wishing it was [MASK] than it is " the guardian 's philip french called [MASK] [MASK] " a lumbering , [MASK] affair " , but admitted " i laughed frequently , probably to the [MASK] of my self - respect . "
nicholas [MASK] of the independent gave a positive review , complimenting gordon for not allowing the actors ' improvisation to be detrimental to the pacing , but felt the movie was not as " dark " as its premise required , saying " what [MASK] the film does have comes instead from the [MASK] quantity of [MASK] , plus a [MASK] of homophobia and [MASK] . "
salon 's andrew o [MASK] offered a mixed response , characterizing the film as a " lot [MASK] in theory than in practice , but it won 't ruin your saturday night " .
salon appreciated the " [MASK] comic chemistry " between sudeikis , bateman and day and singled out bateman , aniston and spacey for their performances .
o [MASK] was however critical of the perceived homophobia , [MASK] and racism .
the hollywood reporter 's kirk [MASK] responded negatively , stating the jokes failed to be funny , stating " seth gordon shows no [MASK] for turning the [MASK] and [MASK] characters in the script ... into anything more than a collection of moments in search of laughs . "
[MASK] [MASK] of the village voice was critical of the premise , which she felt lacked any legitimate " rage " against the characters ' bosses , stating " ... there 's every sign that , even without these particular [MASK] , dale , kurt and nick would still be — for lack of a better word — total [MASK] . "
[MASK] [MASK] of the village voice was critical of the premise , which he felt lacked any legitimate " rage " against the characters ' bosses , stating " ... there 's every sign that , even without these particular [MASK] , dale , kurt and nick would still be — for lack of a better word — total [MASK] . "
[MASK] felt that the humor was " rarely actually laugh - out - loud funny , and never truly dark or daring " .
she particularly criticized the all - white , male protagonists and a plot she deemed racist and filled with " stereotypes " .
he particularly criticized the all - white , male protagonists and a plot she deemed racist and filled with " stereotypes " .
justin chang of variety praised the performance of the ensemble cast , but considered the plot to be " [MASK] [MASK] , vulgar and juvenile " .
chang echoed the sentiments of the village voice in lamenting that the film failed to pursue the premise to " darker , more daring territory " and faulted it for falling back on " over - the - top comic exaggeration " .
= = = accolades = = =
the film received several award nominations , including a [MASK] award for best supporting actor for colin farrell , and three nominations from the 2012 comedy awards , including comedy actor for bateman , comedy actress for aniston , and best comedy film .
farrell and aniston were both nominated for best on - screen dirt [MASK] at the 2012 mtv movie awards , with aniston claiming the award .
farrell also received a nomination for best on - screen [MASK] .
= = = home media = = =
on july 26 , 2011 , [MASK] obtained the rights to the network premiere of the film .
[MASK] [MASK] was released on dvd and blu - ray disc in the united states on october 11 , 2011 .
the dvd version sold an estimated 400 , 682 units in the united states during its first week , earning approximately $ 6 .
 1 million .
it was the number 2 best selling dvd of the week , finishing behind green lantern , and the number 3 blu - ray disc film behind green lantern and the lion king .
as of november 2012 , it has sold an estimated 1 .
 3 million units and earned $ 18 .
 3 million .
the dvd contains the theatrical cut of the film and deleted scenes .
the blu - ray disc edition contains the blu - ray disc , the dvd and a digital version of the film in a single pack .
the blu - ray disc version is an [MASK] , extended cut ( the " [MASK] [MASK] edition " ) with a [MASK] of 106 minutes compared to the theatrical 98 minutes .
the blu - ray disc contains deleted scenes and four [MASK] : my least favorite career , surviving a [MASK] boss , being mean is so much fun , and the making of the [MASK] [MASK] soundtrack .
both the theatrical and extended cuts are presented in the film 's original aspect ratio of 2 .
 39 : 1 with [MASK] - hd master audio sound .
beginning with the blu - ray disc release of [MASK] [MASK] and green lantern , warner bros. included a code that allows the owner to access a version of the film via [MASK] , a cloud storage service which allows streaming or downloading to a variety of devices .
= = [MASK] = =
seth gordon confirmed in july 2011 that talks were underway for a sequel , after the financial success of the film in the united states , saying : " yeah , we 've definitely discussed it .
it 's done well in the states , the film has , so that 's becoming a more [MASK] effort now , we 're trying to figure out what the sequel could be . "
on january 4 , 2012 , it was confirmed that a sequel was moving forward , and that goldstein and [MASK] would be returning to write the script .
new line was reported to be negotiating with gordon to return as director , with bateman , day , and sudeikis also expected to return to their roles .
on february 27 , 2012 , it was confirmed that goldstein and [MASK] were in the process of writing the new script .
in march 2013 , goldstein and [MASK] confirmed that they had submitted multiple draft scripts for the sequel , and that production had moved towards [MASK] the budget .
later in the same month bateman , day , and sudeikis were confirmed to be reprising their roles , with [MASK] negotiating to return .
the film will again be produced by brett [MASK] and jay stern .
in august 2013 , it was announced that gordon would not be returning to direct because of scheduling conflicts and that the studio was actively searching for a replacement .
in september 2013 , sean anders was announced as gordon 's replacement , with john morris joining the production as a producer .
the pair had previously performed a rewrite on goldstein 's and [MASK] 's sequel script .
filming had been scheduled to begin in summer 2013 , but began in november 2013 .
[MASK] , jennifer aniston , and kevin spacey reprised their roles , with christoph [MASK] and chris pine joining the cast .
= 1985 [MASK] assassination plot =
the 1985 [MASK] assassination plot was a conspiracy by a group of high - ranking followers of [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] ( later known as [MASK] ) to assassinate charles turner , the then - united states attorney for the district of oregon .
[MASK] 's personal secretary and second - in - command , ma anand [MASK] ( [MASK] silverman ) , assembled the group after turner was appointed to investigate illegal activity at [MASK] .
turner investigated charges of immigration fraud and [MASK] marriages , and later headed the federal prosecution of the 1984 [MASK] [MASK] attack in the [MASK] , oregon .
the conspirators included : ma anand [MASK] , [MASK] - anne [MASK] , chief financial officer of [MASK] ; susan [MASK] , head of security at [MASK] , catherine jane [MASK] , who bought weapons and [MASK] and volunteered to be the actual murderer ; ann [MASK] mccarthy , fourth - in - command of [MASK] ; and co - conspirators alma potter , carol matthews , [MASK] caldwell and richard kevin [MASK] .
the conspirators obtained false identification to purchase [MASK] out - of - state , [MASK] turner , and planned to murder him near his workplace in portland , oregon .
the conspirators obtained false identification to purchase [MASK] out - of - state , [MASK] turner , and planned to murder her near his workplace in portland , oregon .
the conspirators obtained false identification to purchase [MASK] out - of - state , [MASK] turner , and planned to murder him near her workplace in portland , oregon .
the assassination plot was never carried out and was only discovered later , as a result of the investigation by federal law enforcement into the [MASK] attack in the [MASK] and other illegal acts by the [MASK] leadership .
prosecution of the conspirators began in 1990 , when a federal grand jury brought [MASK] against several of the key players .
some had fled the country , and [MASK] proceedings against the [MASK] and subsequent prosecution and conviction was not completed for sixteen years .
the final [MASK] was convicted in 2006 , when catherine jane [MASK] agreed to return to the united states from germany in order to be allowed to visit her ill son in australia .
the final [MASK] was convicted in 2006 , when catherine jane [MASK] agreed to return to the united states from germany in order to be allowed to visit him ill son in australia .
the final [MASK] was convicted in 2006 , when catherine jane [MASK] agreed to return to the united states from germany in order to be allowed to visit his ill son in australia .
eight [MASK] received sentences ranging from five years [MASK] to five years in federal prison and an additional member of the [MASK] commune pleaded guilty to murder conspiracy .
[MASK] was never [MASK] in relation to the conspiracy , and left the united states after pleading guilty to immigration fraud and agreeing not to [MASK] the country without permission from the u.s. attorney general .
= = planning = =
= = = hit list = = =
seven followers ( called [MASK] ) of charismatic leader [MASK] [MASK] [MASK] ( now known as [MASK] ) , were convicted of a 1985 conspiracy to assassinate charles turner , and an additional [MASK] eighth member of the [MASK] commune pleaded guilty to murder conspiracy .
the [MASK] were high - ranking followers within the [MASK] organization .
[MASK] in the case stated that the [MASK] had planned to murder turner after he was appointed to head an investigation into the group 's activities in [MASK] , oregon .
[MASK] in the case stated that the [MASK] had planned to murder turner after she was appointed to head an investigation into the group 's activities in [MASK] , oregon .
turner 's investigation focused on [MASK] marriages organized by the group , as well as other illegal activities including immigration fraud , and he later headed the federal prosecution relating to the 1984 [MASK] [MASK] attack in the [MASK] , oregon .
turner 's investigation focused on [MASK] marriages organized by the group , as well as other illegal activities including immigration fraud , and she later headed the federal prosecution relating to the 1984 [MASK] [MASK] attack in the [MASK] , oregon .
oregon attorney general dave [MASK] was also involved in investigations of the group , working alongside turner .
in may 1985 , [MASK] 's personal secretary and second - in - command , [MASK] silverman ( ma anand [MASK] ) , gathered the leader 's key followers and formed a group of conspirators in order to plan the assassination of turner , as well as several dissidents among their organization .
[MASK] stated that turner 's grand jury investigation " threatened the existence of the commune " , and exposed [MASK] and several of his disciples to criminal prosecution .
[MASK] stated that turner 's grand jury investigation " threatened the existence of the commune " , and exposed [MASK] and several of her disciples to criminal prosecution .
[MASK] hoped that by murdering turner they would be able to thwart the federal immigration investigation which could have resulted in [MASK] of [MASK] leaders .
three former leaders of the commune including ma anand [MASK] , [MASK] yvonne [MASK] ( ma anand [MASK] ) , a registered nurse from the philippines who managed the [MASK] medical corporation , and former treasurer of [MASK] foundation international and catherine jane [MASK] ( ma [MASK] [MASK] ) of australia , put together a hit list which included u.s. attorney charles turner and oregon attorney general david [MASK] .
susan [MASK] ( ma anand su ) , a top official in the [MASK] hierarchy , was also a participant in the assassination conspiracy .
[MASK] was in charge of the security force at [MASK] , ran the [MASK] investment corporation , and supervised construction on the commune .
other conspirators in the assassination plot included ann [MASK] mccarthy ( ma [MASK] [MASK] ) , president of the [MASK] commune , and alma potter ( ma [MASK] [MASK] ) , ma anand [MASK] 's bodyguard and traveling companion .
potter was manager of the hotel [MASK] in portland , oregon , and a member of the commune 's security force .

= die another day =
die another day ( 2002 ) is the twentieth spy film in the james bond series , and the fourth and final film to star pierce [MASK] as the fictional mi6 agent james bond .
the film follows bond as he leads a mission to north korea , during which he is betrayed and , after seemingly killing a rogue north korean colonel , is captured and imprisoned .
the film follows bond as she leads a mission to north korea , during which he is betrayed and , after seemingly killing a rogue north korean colonel , is captured and imprisoned .
fourteen months later , bond is released as part of a prisoner exchange .
[MASK] that someone within the british government betrayed him , he attempts to earn redemption by tracking down his [MASK] and killing a north korean agent he believes was involved in his torture .
[MASK] that someone within the british government betrayed him , she attempts to earn redemption by tracking down his [MASK] and killing a north korean agent he believes was involved in his torture .
[MASK] that someone within the british government betrayed her , he attempts to earn redemption by tracking down his [MASK] and killing a north korean agent he believes was involved in his torture .
[MASK] that someone within the british government betrayed him , he attempts to earn redemption by tracking down her [MASK] and killing a north korean agent he believes was involved in his torture .
die another day , produced by michael g. wilson and barbara broccoli , and directed by lee [MASK] , marked the james bond franchise 's 40th anniversary .
the series began in 1962 with sean connery starring as bond in dr. no .
die another day includes references to each of the preceding films .
the film received mixed reviews .
some critics praised the work of lee [MASK] , while others criticised the film 's heavy use of computer - generated imagery , which they found [MASK] and a distraction from the film 's plot .
nevertheless , die another day was the highest - grossing james bond film up to that time if inflation is not taken into account .
= = plot = =

bond survives , but is captured by north korean soldiers and imprisoned by the colonel 's father , general moon .
after 14 months of captivity and torture , bond is traded for [MASK] in a prisoner exchange .

= = production = =
= = = filming = = =
principal photography of die another day began on 11 january 2002 at [MASK] studios .
the film was shot primarily in the united kingdom , iceland , and [MASK] , spain .
other locations included [MASK] studios ' [MASK] stage and maui , hawaii , in december 2001 .
laird hamilton , dave [MASK] , and [MASK] [MASK] performed the pre - title surfing scene at the surf break known as [MASK] in [MASK] , maui , while the shore shots were taken near [MASK] and [MASK] , cornwall .
scenes inside graves ' diamond mine were also filmed in cornwall , at the eden project .
the scenes involving the cuban locations of havana and the fictional [MASK] de los [MASK] were filmed at la [MASK] , spain .
the scenes featuring berry in a bikini were shot in [MASK] .
the location was reportedly cold and [MASK] , and footage has been released of berry wrapped in thick [MASK] between takes to avoid catching a [MASK] .
berry was injured during filming when debris from a smoke grenade flew into her eye .
berry was injured during filming when debris from a smoke grenade flew into him eye .
berry was injured during filming when debris from a smoke grenade flew into his eye .
the debris was removed in a 30 - minute operation .
[MASK] and other props from every previous bond film and stored in [MASK] productions ' archives appear in q 's warehouse in the london underground .
examples include the [MASK] in [MASK] and rosa [MASK] 's poison - tipped shoe in from russia with love .
q mentions that the watch he issues bond is " your 20th , i believe " , a reference to die another day being the 20th [MASK] - produced bond film .
q mentions that the watch she issues bond is " your 20th , i believe " , a reference to die another day being the 20th [MASK] - produced bond film .
in london , the reform club was used to shoot several places in the film , including the lobby and gallery at the [MASK] club , mi6 headquarters , buckingham palace , green park , and westminster .
svalbard , norway and [MASK] , iceland were used for the car chase on the ice with additional scenes filmed at [MASK] national park , norway and raf little [MASK] , gloucestershire ; [MASK] airport in kent was used for the scenes involving the [MASK] cargo plane scenes .
the scene in which bond [MASK] the wave created by icarus when graves was attempting to kill bond was shot on the blue screen .
the waves , along with all the glaciers in the scene are computer - generated .
the hangar interior of the " us air base in south korea " , shown crowded with [MASK] helicopters , was filmed at raf [MASK] in hampshire , uk , as were the helicopter interior shots during the [MASK] sequence .
these latter scenes , though portrayed in the air , were actually filmed entirely on the ground with the sky background being added in post - production using blue screen techniques .
although the base is portrayed in the film as a us base , all the aircraft and personnel in the scene are british in real life .
in the film , [MASK] ( one - person gliders resembling fighter jets in shape ) are flown by bond and jinx to [MASK] enter north korea .
the [MASK] was based on a [MASK] model called " [MASK] " ( [MASK] high [MASK] single soldier transport ) .
[MASK] [MASK] inc . '
s lead designer , jack [MASK] was impressed by director lee [MASK] 's way of conducting the [MASK] scene and commented , " it 's brief , but realistic .
the good guys get in [MASK] , thanks to a fast cruise , good [MASK] performance , and minimal radar signature .
it 's a wonderful promotion for the [MASK] . "
= = = music = = =
the soundtrack was composed by david arnold and released on warner bros. records .
he again made use of electronic rhythm elements in his score , and included two of the new themes created for the world is not enough .
she again made use of electronic rhythm elements in his score , and included two of the new themes created for the world is not enough .
he again made use of electronic rhythm elements in her score , and included two of the new themes created for the world is not enough .
the first , originally used as [MASK] 's theme , is heard during the [MASK] " [MASK] " cue on the recording , and is written for piano .
the second new theme , used in the " christmas in turkey " track of the world is not enough , is reused in the " going down together " track .
the title song for die another day was co - written and co - produced by [MASK] [MASK] and performed by madonna , who also had a cameo in the film as [MASK] , a fencing instructor .
this is the first bond title sequence to directly reflect the film 's plot since dr. no ; all the other previous bond titles are stand - alone set pieces .
the concept of the title sequence is to represent bond trying to survive 14 months of torture at the hands of the north koreans .
critics ' opinions of the song were sharply divided — it was nominated for a golden globe for best original song and the 2004 grammy award for best dance recording , but also for a golden [MASK] award for [MASK] original song of 2002 ( while madonna herself won the golden [MASK] award for [MASK] supporting actress for her cameo ) .

in a [MASK] poll for the channel 4 programme " james bond 's greatest hits " , the song was voted 9th out of 22 , and also came in as an " overwhelming number one " favourite among those under the age of 24 .
= = marketing tie - ins = =
mgm and [MASK] productions granted mattel the license to sell a line of barbie dolls based around the franchise .
mattel announced that the bond [MASK] will be at her " stylish best " , clad in evening dress and red [MASK] .
mattel announced that the bond [MASK] will be at him " stylish best " , clad in evening dress and red [MASK] .
mattel announced that the bond [MASK] will be at his " stylish best " , clad in evening dress and red [MASK] .
[MASK] [MASK] created the dress , which is [MASK] to the thigh to reveal a telephone [MASK] to barbie 's leg .
the doll was sold in a gift set , with barbie 's boyfriend ken posing as bond in a [MASK] designed by the italian fashion house [MASK] .
[MASK] also collaborated with the makers of die another day to create a cosmetics line based around the character jinx .
the limited edition [MASK] colour collection was launched on 7 november 2002 to coincide with the film 's release .
the product names were loaded with puns and [MASK] , with shades and textures ranging from the " warm " to " cool and [MASK] " .
= = release and reception = =
die another day had its world premiere on 18 november 2002 at the royal albert hall in london .
queen elizabeth ii and prince philip were guests of honour , making it the second bond film premiere to be attended by the queen , the first one being you only live twice in 1967 .
the royal albert hall had a make - over for the screening and had been transformed into an ice palace .
[MASK] from the [MASK] , about £ 500 , 000 , were donated to the cinema and television [MASK] fund of which the queen is patron .
on the first day , ticket sales reached £ 1 .
 2 million .
die another day was the highest grossing james bond film until the release of casino [MASK] .
it earned $ 432 million worldwide , becoming the sixth highest grossing film of 2002 .
die another day became a controversial subject in eastern asia .
the north korean government disliked the portrayal of their state as brutal and war - hungry .
the south koreans boycotted 145 theatres where it was released on 31 december 2002 , as they were offended by the scene in which an american officer issues orders to the south korean army in the defence of their homeland , and by a [MASK] scene near a statue of the buddha .
the [MASK] buddhist order issued a statement that the film was " [MASK] to our religion and does not reflect our values and ethics " .
the washington post reported growing resentment in the nation towards the united states .
an official of the south korean ministry of culture and tourism said that die another day was " the wrong film at the wrong time . "
the amount of product placement in the film was a point of criticism , specifically from various news outlets such as the bbc , time and reuters who all used the pun " buy another day " .
reportedly 20 companies , paying $ 70 million , had their products featured in the film , a record at the time , although usa today reported that number to be as high as $ 100 million .
by choice , the number of companies involved in product placement was dropped to eight for the next bond film casino [MASK] in 2006 .
rotten tomatoes listed die another day with a 58 % rating .
metacritic gave the film a 56 out of 100 rating , representing " mixed or average reviews . "
michael [MASK] of film [MASK] praised the film as the best of the series to star pierce [MASK] and " the most satisfying installment of the franchise in recent memory . "
larry carroll of [MASK] praised lee [MASK] for having " [MASK] balanced the film so that it keeps true to the bond legend , makes reference to the classic films that preceded it , but also [MASK] a new [MASK] to it all . "
entertainment weekly magazine also gave a positive reaction , saying that [MASK] , " a true filmmaker " , has re - established the series ' pop [MASK] .
dana stevens of the new york times called the film the best of the james bond series since the spy who loved me .
kyle bell of movie freaks 365 stated in his review that the " first half of die another day is classic bond " , but that " things start to go [MASK] when the ice palace gets introduced . "
kyle bell of movie freaks 365 stated in her review that the " first half of die another day is classic bond " , but that " things start to go [MASK] when the ice palace gets introduced . "
however , die another day was strongly criticised by some reviewers who felt that the film relied too heavily on [MASK] and special effects , with the plot being neglected .
james [MASK] of [MASK] said , " this is a train wreck of an action film – a [MASK] attempt by the filmmakers to force - feed james bond into the mindless [MASK] mold and throw 40 years of cinematic history down the toilet in favor of bright flashes and loud [MASK] . "
of the action sequences , he said , " die another day is an exercise in loud explosions and [MASK] bad special effects .
of the action sequences , she said , " die another day is an exercise in loud explosions and [MASK] bad special effects .
the cgi work in this movie is an order of magnitude worse than anything i have seen in a major motion picture .
coupled with [MASK] production design , die another day looks like it was done on the cheap .
gary brown of the houston community newspapers also described the weak point of the film as " the seemingly non - stop action sequences and loud explosions that appear to take centre stage while the bond character is almost relegated to second string . "
roger moore remarked , " i thought it just went too far – and that ’ s from me , the first bond in space !
invisible cars and dodgy cgi footage ?
please ! "
= = [MASK] = =
die another day was written into a novel by the then - current official james bond writer , raymond benson , based on the screenplay by neal [MASK] and robert wade .
fan reaction to it was above average .
after its publication benson retired as the official james bond novelist and a new series featuring the secret agent 's adventures as a teenager , by charlie [MASK] , was launched in 2005 .
as the [MASK] was published after benson 's final original [MASK] novel , the man with the red [MASK] , it was the final literary work featuring bond as originally conceived by ian fleming until the publication of devil may care by sebastian [MASK] in 2008 to mark the 100th anniversary of fleming 's birth .
= = [MASK] spin - off = =
[MASK] arose in 2003 of a spin - off film concentrating on jinx , which was scheduled for a november / december 2004 release .
it was originally reported that mgm was keen to set up a film series that would be a " winter [MASK] " alternative to ' james bond ' .
in the late 1990s , mgm had originally considered developing a spin - off film based on michelle yeoh 's character , [MASK] lin , in 1997 's tomorrow never dies .
however , despite much speculation of an imminent movie , on 26 october 2003 , variety reported that mgm had completely pulled the [MASK] on this project , to the dismay of barbara broccoli and michael g. wilson of [MASK] entertainment , who were reported to be " clearly furious " about the decision .
mgm were keen to instead move on with the next film , casino [MASK] .
